examples: The patient must drink several liters each day
The children like to drink soda
We were up drinking all night
Let us toast the birthday girl!
Let's drink to the New Year

definitions.text: be fascinated or spell-bound by; pay close attention to
examples: The mother drinks in every word of her son on the stage

definitions.text: drink excessive amounts of alcohol; be an alcoholic
examples: The husband drinks and beats his wife

definitions.text: stupefied or excited by a chemical substance (especially alcohol)
examples: a noisy crowd of intoxicated sailors

definitions.text: as if under the influence of alcohol
